questions.question: Tokyo is a big city. Here big is an ………………….
questions.description: Adjectives of quality show the kind or quality of a person or thing.

questions.question: She ate some rice. Here some is an ……………………….
questions.description: Adjectives of quantity say how much of a thing is meant.

questions.question: The foolish crow opened his mouth to sing. Here foolish is an …………………………
questions.description: Adjectives of quality show the kind or quality of a person or thing.

questions.question: He has little patience. Here little is an ……………………………….
questions.description: Adjectives of quantity say how much of a thing is meant.

questions.question: He has lost all of his wealth. Here all is an ………………………….
questions.description: Adjectives of quantity say how much of a thing is meant.

questions.question: We did not receive sufficient rain this year. Here sufficient is an
questions.description: Adjectives of quantity say how much of a thing is meant.

questions.question: Each hand has five fingers. Here five is an …………………………
questions.description: Adjectives of number show how many persons or things are meant.

questions.question: There are several mistakes in your composition. Here several is an ……………………….
questions.description: Adjectives of number show how many persons or things are meant.

questions.question: January is the first month of the year. Here the adjective first is an ……………………….
questions.description: Ordinal numbers are all adjectives of number.

questions.question: Our country expects every citizen to do their duty. Here every is a ……………………………
questions.description: Distributive adjectives refer to each one of a group.

questions.question: Neither accusation is true. Here neither is a …………………………..
questions.description: Distributive adjectives refer to each one of a group.

questions.question: Those apples are ripe. Here those is a ……………………………..
questions.description: Demonstrative adjectives point out which person or thing is meant.
